SELECT MF.COMPANY_CD , MF.DIVISION_CD , MF.FILE_ID , MF.FILE_TYPE , MF.FILE_NM , MF.PARAMETER , UTL_RAW.CAST_TO_VARCHAR2(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(MF.FILE_BLOB,DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(MF.FILE_BLOB))) AS FILE_BLOB , MF.DESCRIPTION , MF.CREATE_BY , MF.CREATE_DATE , MF.UPDATE_BY , MF.UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_FILE MF WHERE MF.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MF.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MF.FILE_TYPE = #{fileType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (UPPER(MF.FILE_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{fileNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' )

insert.selectKey: SELECT 'FM' || LPAD(FILE_UPLOAD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,5,'0') AS SEQ FROM DUAL
